{{Description|A soldier encased within a Fatui war machine.<br />Armed with equipment that can control the elements to a certain extent, their guns are capable of firing jets of {{Color|Hydro|water}}. These skirmishers do not question if they shall live or die as they advance into nations far from home to complete advance missions and lay the groundwork for operations to come.}}
{{Enemy Intro}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Water Blast:''' Shoots a fast projectile from their cannon, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.
*'''Healing Bubble:''' Shoots a healing bubble at an ally which will heal them over a period of time.
**'''Enhanced:''' While their '''Hydro Armor''' is active, the Hydrogunner Legionnaire can heal multiple allies at once.
*'''Ram:''' If the player strays too near, rams the player with their belly, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used when the '''Hydro Armor''' is inactive.
*'''Hydro Armor:''' Upon reaching '''50%''' HP or after some time has passed, generates a {{Hydro}} [[Shields|shield]], granting them a massive increase in [[Resistance]]s and enhancing their '''Healing Bubble''' ability. The shield is weakest to {{Color|Electro}}. Breaking the shield will leave them stunned and vulnerable to attack.
